thread.title: Winter Olympics hit by cyber attack

title: Winter Olympics hit by cyber attack
text:
Winter Olympics hit by cyber attack 11:06am EST - 00:55 
Officials have confirmed a cyber attack struck during Friday's opening ceremony for the Pyeongchang Winter Olympics, but they have refused to give any detail regarding who might be responsible. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Officials have confirmed a cyber attack struck during Friday's opening ceremony for the Pyeongchang Winter Olympics, but they have refused to give any detail regarding who might be responsible. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2sqnDsS
